component.name: Playchitect
component.summary: Smart DJ playlist management with intelligent BPM clustering

description.p: Playchitect transforms DJ playlist creation from rigid BPM-based grouping to intelligent multi-dimensional clustering. Instead of grouping tracks solely by tempo, it analyses BPM alongside spectral brightness, high-frequency energy, RMS loudness and percussiveness to create playlists that feel coherent â€” not just mathematically similar.

ul.li: Native GNOME interface built with GTK4 and libadwaita

description.p: First stable release. Includes the full clustering engine, GTK4 GUI, CUE sheet export, desktop integration, PyPI package, and self-hosted Flatpak bundle.
